text:
@realDonaldTrump No doubt, America is in mourning.
Over 20% of the US workforce is unemployed. 
More than 30 million have filed for unemployment.
Every 47 seconds an American dies of COVID19.
We can’t afford four more years of him. #MourningInAmerica

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.
